body: good catch but which version are you using?

issue.title: ENH Pytorch-backend 2D branch [3a]

repository.name: kymatio
repository.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration

issue.body:
I'm redoing the PR for the 2D Pytorch branch, reason being that the commit history of the previous PR was too messy.

This PR should be important; I'll carry over the general thoughts and changes and complaints about this 2d branch to the other branches, same goes with all the different API. It would be nice if the codebase across all the dimensions had the same 'voice', if that makes sense (currently, the code for the three different dimensions read like they were each written by a different person. it'd be nice if we could unify everything.).

Getting it right the first time is going to be important!

body: @janden it seems this is now hardcoded, isn't it?

The error message? No we can still change it. I've been changing it here and there. Not sure if I got all of the instances of `A` and `B`, but we're getting there. Keeping this open until I've got them all.
